name: RNGeezus
description:
My first attempt at a full game that isn't a copy of a game that already exists. Time just kept on slipping (slipping slipping slipping...) so the movement is unpolished and the move sets are not complete. 

RNGeezus is trying to get home, Hit ESCAPE to reset the level, and reach the end as quickly as possible, and turn back to yellow!! (The end state is also, unsurprisingly, not done properly...)

Thank you to Kenney for use of an tile asset, partially edited but most of the art comes directly from the edited tile set. Link below!

https://www.kenney.nl/assets
